patthana1.9:1.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—dassanena pahātabbaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…

patthana1.9:30.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye nava, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme nava, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne nava, magge nava, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā tīṇi, vigate tīṇi, avigate nava.

patthana1.9:62.1_0: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.9:64.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.9:66.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge dve, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā tīṇi, natthiyā tīṇi, vigate tīṇi, avigate tīṇi.

patthana1.9:138.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā tīṇi, natthiyā tīṇi, vigate tīṇi, avigate tīṇi.
patthana1.9:140.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate khandhe saṁsaṭṭho vicikicchāsahagato moho.
patthana1.9:141.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—uddhaccasahagate khandhe saṁsaṭṭho uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana1.9:142.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.9:143.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā …
patthana1.9:144.1_0: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, napurejāte tīṇi, napacchājāte tīṇi, naāsevane tīṇi, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke tīṇi, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, navippayutte tīṇi.
patthana1.9:146.1_0: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā tīṇi, napurejāte tīṇi, napacchājāte tīṇi, naāsevane tīṇi, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi.
patthana1.9:148.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge dve, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā tīṇi, natthiyā tīṇi, vigate tīṇi, avigate tīṇi.
patthana1.9:150.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ sampayutto dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana1.9:151.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—dassanena pahātabbā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:152.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—dassanena pahātabbā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:153.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—dassanena pahātabbā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:154.1_1: dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—bhāvanāya pahātabbā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:155.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa …pe…
patthana1.9:155.1_1: bhāvanāya pahātabbā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:156.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa ca dhammassa …pe…
patthana1.9:156.1_1: bhāvanāya pahātabbā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:157.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa …pe…
patthana1.9:157.1_1: nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:157.1_2: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:158.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dassanena pahātabbaṁ rāgaṁ assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati.
patthana1.9:158.1_1: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati, diṭṭhiṁ assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati.
patthana1.9:158.1_2: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati, vicikicchaṁ ārabbha vicikicchā uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, dassanena pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati.
patthana1.9:158.1_3: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati.
patthana1.9:159.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā dassanena pahātabbe pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.9:159.1_1: Dassanena pahātabbe khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti.
patthana1.9:159.1_3: Dassanena pahātabbā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:160.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ rāgaṁ assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha bhāvanāya pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, uddhaccaṁ uppajjati.
patthana1.9:160.1_1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati, uddhaccaṁ ārabbha uddhaccaṁ uppajjati.
patthana1.9:160.1_2: Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati, bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ ārabbha bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati, uddhaccaṁ uppajjati.
patthana1.9:161.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ rāgaṁ assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, dassanena pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati.
patthana1.9:161.1_1: Uddhaccaṁ ārabbha diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, dassanena pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati.
patthana1.9:161.1_2: Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati.
patthana1.9:162.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā bhāvanāya pahātabbe pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.9:162.1_1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbe khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, cetopariyañāṇena bhāvanāya pahātabbacittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānanti.
patthana1.9:162.1_2: Bhāvanāya pahātabbā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:163.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ paccavekkhati.
patthana1.9:163.1_1: Ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti, phalaṁ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ paccavekkhanti;
patthana1.9:163.1_2: nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:163.1_3: Cakkhuṁ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati; sotaṁ … ghānaṁ … jivhaṁ … kāyaṁ … rūpe … sadde … gandhe … rase …
patthana1.9:163.1_6: nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbe khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati;
patthana1.9:163.1_7: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbacittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānanti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ viññāṇañcāyatanassa …pe…
patthana1.9:163.1_11: nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:164.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, dassanena pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati.
patthana1.9:164.1_2: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbo rāgo …pe…
patthana1.9:164.1_5: jhāne parihīne vippaṭisārissa dassanena pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati.
patthana1.9:164.1_6: Cakkhuṁ assādeti abhinandati …pe… sotaṁ … ghānaṁ … jivhaṁ … kāyaṁ … rūpe … sadde … gandhe … rase …
patthana1.9:164.1_9: nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbe khandhe assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbo rāgo …pe…
patthana1.9:165.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha bhāvanāya pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, uddhaccaṁ uppajjati, bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati.
patthana1.9:165.1_6: taṁ ārabbha bhāvanāya pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, uddhaccaṁ uppajjati, bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati.
patthana1.9:166.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.9:166.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—dassanena pahātabbaṁ rāgaṁ garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā dassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati;
patthana1.9:166.1_2: diṭṭhiṁ garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā dassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.9:167.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:168.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:168.1_1: **Sahajātādhipati**—dassanena pahātabbādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:169.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.9:169.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ rāgaṁ garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā bhāvanāya pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati.
patthana1.9:170.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:170.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ rāgaṁ garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā dassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.9:171.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:172.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:172.1_1: **Sahajātādhipati**—bhāvanāya pahātabbādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:173.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.9:173.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni …pe…
patthana1.9:173.1_2: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, phalaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti;
patthana1.9:173.1_3: nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:173.1_4: **Sahajātādhipati**—nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:174.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:174.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā dassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.9:174.1_6: nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbe khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā dassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.9:175.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:175.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā bhāvanāya pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati.
patthana1.9:175.1_3: nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbe khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā bhāvanāya pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati.
patthana1.9:176.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā dassanena pahātabbā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ dassanena pahātabbānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:177.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—dassanena pahātabbā khandhā vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:178.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā bhāvanāya pahātabbā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ bhāvanāya pahātabbānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:179.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—bhāvanāya pahātabbā khandhā vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:180.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:180.1_8: nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:181.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa …pe…
patthana1.9:181.1_1: āvajjanā dassanena pahātabbānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:182.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—āvajjanā bhāvanāya pahātabbānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:183.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:184.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana1.9:237.1_1: taṁ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, dassanena pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati, sotaṁ …pe…
patthana1.9:237.1_3: vatthu dassanena pahātabbānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:238.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— **purejātaṁ** cakkhuṁ assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.9:238.1_1: taṁ ārabbha bhāvanāya pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, uddhaccaṁ uppajjati, bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati, sotaṁ …pe…
patthana1.9:238.1_3: vatthu bhāvanāya pahātabbānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:239.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana1.9:239.1_1: **Sahajāto**—dassanena pahātabbo eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.9:240.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.9:240.1_1: **Sahajātā**—dassanena pahātabbā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:240.1_2: **Pacchājātā**—dassanena pahātabbā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:240.1_3: **Pacchājātā**—dassanena pahātabbā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:241.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā bhāvanāya pahātabbassa …pe….
patthana1.9:242.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa natthipaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.9:243.1_0: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe aṭṭha, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye aṭṭha, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre satta, indriye satta, jhāne satta, magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate terasa.
patthana1.9:245.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.9:246.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.9:247.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:248.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.9:249.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.9:250.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.9:251.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:252.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.9:253.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.9:254.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.9:255.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana1.9:256.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.9:257.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana1.9:258.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.9:259.1_0: Nahetuyā cuddasa, naārammaṇe cuddasa, naadhipatiyā cuddasa, naanantare cuddasa, nasamanantare cuddasa, nasahajāte dasa, naaññamaññe dasa, nanissaye dasa, naupanissaye cuddasa, napurejāte dvādasa, napacchājāte cuddasa, naāsevane cuddasa, nakamme cuddasa, navipāke cuddasa, naāhāre cuddasa, naindriye cuddasa, najhāne cuddasa, namagge cuddasa, nasampayutte dasa, navippayutte aṭṭha, noatthiyā aṭṭha, nonatthiyā cuddasa, novigate cuddasa, noavigate aṭṭha.
patthana1.9:261.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte satta, naāsevane satta, nakamme satta, navipāke satta, naāhāre satta, naindriye satta, najhāne satta, namagge satta, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta.
patthana1.9:263.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe aṭṭha, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye aṭṭha, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre satta, indriye satta, jhāne satta, magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate terasa.
